text.Prompt:
Item name:
Magnaflow 35168 Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip

Item features:
Reduces exhaust gas pressure and enhances the performance of the exhaust system
Manufactured from high-strength stainless steel
Mirror-like finish
Easy to install
Corrosion resistant
Backed by a lifetime warranty

Product description:
text.Response A: Magnaflow Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip is designed to reduce exhaust gas pressure and enhance the performance of the exhaust system. It is manufactured from high-strength stainless steel and comes in a mirror-like finish. This exhaust tip features a 2.25-inch tip. It is corrosion-resistant, easy to install, and backed by a lifetime warranty.
text.Response B: This Magnaflow 35168 Stainless Steel 2.25" Exhaust Tip can reduce exhaust gas pressure and enhance the performance of the exhaust system.  It is manufactured from high-strength stainless steel with a mirror-like finish and is easy to install.  This exhaust tip is corrosion resistant and is backed by a lifetime warranty.
